{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-01T16:27:40.000Z", "description": "

This is your dream position if you love providing actionable insights from sources like media buying platforms and customer journeys through the e-commerce cycle.


THIS IS POSITION FOR OUR OFFICE IN SALT LAKE CITY, UTAH.

 

Responsibilities

  • Analyze raw data: assessing quality, cleansing, structuring for downstream processing
  • Collaborate with the media buyer team to bring analytical insights to the reality
  • Generate actionable insights for business improvements


Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, information systems.)
  • At least 1 - 2 years' of experience in analytics
  • Experience in gathering insights from google ads manager, Facebook, Shopify, Gemini, Acuity, taboola, etc.
